# Figures

```{r fcatch, fig.cap="Estimated and observed long-term and recent commercial catch of GOA dusky rockfish in the Gulf of Alaska.", eval = T}

```

```{r fsurvey, fig.cap="Observed (geostatistical model-based estimates) and predicted GOA dusky rockfish trawl survey biomass based on the 2022 recommended model. Error bars are approximate asymptotic 95% confidence intervals of model error.", eval = T}

```

```{r fbiomass, fig.cap="Model estimated total biomass and spawning biomass with 95% credible intervals determined by MCMC (shaded) for Gulf of Alaska dusky rockfish.", eval = T}

```

```{r fswath, fig.cap="Median dusky rockfish spawning stock biomass from MCMC simulations with Bayesian credible intervals including projections for 2023-2037, when managing under Scenario 2. Each shade is 5% of the posterior distribution.", eval = T}

knitr::include_graphics(here::here(year, pref_mod, "figs", "swath.png"))
```
